ref: 420a †*apacullī -- ʻ side or secondary stove ʼ. [Cf. apadvāra- ʻ side door ʼ Suśr.: cullī -- ]
Pk. ōculla -- n. ʻ a part of a stove ʼ Deśīn.;
G. hol f. ʻ hearth in form of a large trench ʼ, (h)olo m. ʻ side part of stove to hold pots ʼ. --
P. āhulā, auhlā m. ʻ secondary opening in a stove to put pots on ʼ,
WPah.J. auli f. ʻ fireplace, stove ʼ rather < *ācullī -- .
